version_description:
-Multiple bug fixes and improvements.
-Tutorials
-Improved search.
-Universal links

-Multiple bug fixes and improvements.
-Tutorials
-Improved search.
-Universal links

Hello, fellow musicians.

We’ve been working tirelessly to bring you the features that you have been asking for. And now, with semi-tones and broken bows strewn across the floor in our office, we have some good news!

Batch upload: You no longer have to wait to upload a single pdf. Now, you can queue your pdfs so that they upload into nkoda (in the background) as you continue to play.

Share user uploads: You’re now able to share your uploaded pdfs with other users on nkoda. Any personal works or annotations can be viewed by your friends and colleagues.

Apple Pencil: When you use your apple pencil outside of annotation mode, it will automatically annotate, rather than having to open the annotation mode each time.

And that’s it this time around. If you have any more requests, send us your ideas to support@nkoda.com as we want to make this app as much a reflection of you as it is of us at nkoda. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates coming soon!

Hello, fellow musicians.

We’ve been working tirelessly to bring you the features that you have been asking for. And now, with semi-tones and broken bows strewn across the floor in our office, we have some good news!

Batch upload: You no longer have to wait to upload a single pdf. Now, you can queue your pdfs so that they upload into nkoda (in the background) as you continue to play.

Share user uploads: You’re now able to share your uploaded pdfs with other users on nkoda. Any personal works or annotations can be viewed by your friends and colleagues.

Apple Pencil: When you use your apple pencil outside of annotation mode, it will automatically annotate, rather than having to open the annotation mode each time.

And that’s it this time around. If you have any more requests, send us your ideas to support@nkoda.com as we want to make this app as much a reflection of you as it is of us at nkoda. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates coming soon!
Now you can jump between scores and parts while within Score view and you can play different pieces in sequence, "Bach to Bach!"
Now you can jump between scores and parts while within Score view and you can play different pieces in sequence, "Bach to Bach!"

Over the last few months at nkoda, we have been working furiously to give our existing annotation tools a lick of paint, and introduce a range of sparkling new ones as well!

Users can now place a range of predesigned musical symbols on any score, and store their favourites for even quicker access. Scalable symbols such as slurs, brackets and staves can also be added and sized at will. The text tool has been revamped, giving users the ability to move and resize text with precision, and finally, a brand new lasso tool allows users to select annotations, and move, resize, rotate or delete them.

As always, latest bug fixes and improvements.

Performance enhancements and optimizations on page-turning, zooming, drawing tools and score navigation.

Various bug fixes & improvements including:
Easy access to recently played material
Quick navigation to Library items, Playlists, Uploads, Annotations
Filter and search annotations, uploads, offline items.
Improvements in offline usage
Direct access to customer support, content request, report issues & FAQs
Improved login restore functionalities
Overall design and UX improvements.

You can now customise your score display to view your music in various layouts such as full width, 2 pages and 4 pages.
